RT @gsissh_matrix: @e_steroids More here 

https://t.co/FapzvrKTHl https://t.co/NcAMRgvyfk

The whole thing was created over the span of two hacking days in the #experiments channel in Esteroids dWeb Discord. 

It was done by energetic brilliant community members,  all we did was observe & cheer them.

Join us for more original dWeb experiments!

https://t.co/w0gOMyHdti

Technically, you need to plug some files into your .eth website. 

It's really easy to create and configure, the instructions in https://t.co/23oPwDXNOi are really clear.

https://t.co/gOSD7PHzOT used this property of lightning services and added a trick. 

With their method you can send bitcoin over lightning network to a .eth address!

For example, now you can send bitcoin in lightning network to stdin.eth.

Bitcoin doesn't have its own name service, but some lightning services let you use a domain name instead of lightning wallet addresses.

For example with https://t.co/sKGV9nmmdm on Telegram, or https://t.co/IyXyi3jk9g.

We highlight an amazing experiment by @gsissh_matrix and members of Esteroids Discord.

üëâSend BTC over lightning network to a .eth domain

https://t.co/23oPwEfX2q

That's a breakthrough in integrating @ensdomains and Bitcoin üöÄ
